document.full_text: iran has sharply stepped up its use of public executions, hanging 13 men this year, nearly as many as in all of 2010, in an attempt to intimidate its citizens, amnesty international said on wednesday.
document.title: iran steps up rate of public executions: amnesty
lines_and_colors: iran has sharply stepped up its use of public executions, hanging 13 men this year, nearly as many as in all of 2010, in an attempt to intimidate its citizens, amnesty international said on wednesday.
